view
Class Button

java.lang.Object
  view.Button

public class Button
extends java.lang.Object

Contains static methods for creating buttons. It also contains methods for changing the color or icon of a button.

Constructor Summary
Button()
           
 
Method Summary
static void changeColor(javax.swing.JLabel button, java.lang.String color)
          Takes in a JLabel, and changes the color of it to the color given as parameter.
static void changeIcon(javax.swing.JLabel button, java.lang.String icon)
          Takes a JLabel in and changes the icon to the icon given as a string.
static javax.swing.JLabel createButton(java.lang.String text, java.lang.String color, java.lang.String icon)
          Creates and returns a JLabel with the text given as parameter.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

createButton

public static javax.swing.JLabel createButton(java.lang.String text,
                                              java.lang.String color,
                                              java.lang.String icon)
Creates and returns a JLabel with the text given as parameter. The color of the button will be set according to the color string. The icon will be set according to the icon string.

Parameters:
text -
color -
icon -
Returns:
JLabel A button implemented as a JLabel.
